signInForm.title: Sign In
signInForm.description: Enter your credentials to access your account
signInForm.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
signInForm.oauthFailed: OAuth sign in failed. Please try again.
signInForm.userNotFound: No user found with this email address
signInForm.resetFailed: Failed to send reset code. Please try again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

signUpForm.title: Create Account
signUpForm.description: Join StudyHub and start your collaborative learning journey
signUpForm.welcomeMessage: Welcome to StudyHub! You're being signed in automatically...

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&)

signUpForm.codeSent: Verification code sent. Please check your email.
signUpForm.otpDescription: We sent a 6-digit code to <email></email>. It expires in 2 minutes.
signUpForm.resetOtpDescription: We sent a verification code to your email. Enter it below to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordWeak: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase and number

resetPassword.tokenExpired: Reset token has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.resetFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

rooms.title: Study Rooms
rooms.subtitle: Join collaborative study sessions with other learners
rooms.creator: Creator
rooms.searchRooms: Search rooms by name or description...
rooms.beFirstToCreate: Be the first to create a study room!
rooms.createOrJoinToSee: Create or join rooms to see them here
rooms.failedToLoadRooms: Failed to load rooms. Please try again.

createRoomForm.title: Create New Study Room
createRoomForm.description: Set up a collaborative study space for you and your peers
createRoomForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this room is for...
createRoomForm.maxMembersDescription: How many people can join this room
createRoomForm.publicDescription: Anyone can discover and join this room
createRoomForm.privateDescription: Only people with the link or password can join

validation.nameMinLength: Room name must be at least 3 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Room name must be less than 50 characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 200 characters
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

joinRoomDialog.title: Join Room
joinRoomDialog.description: Enter the password to join this private room

roomCard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this room?
roomCard.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. All data in this room will be permanently deleted.
roomCard.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave this room?
roomCard.confirmLeaveDescription: You will no longer have access to this room's content.

roomHeader.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete
roomHeader.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone and will remove all messages, notes, and member data associated with this room.

messages.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this room

form.title: Profile Settings
form.description: Manage your account settings and profile information.
form.uploadFailed: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
form.updateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

validation.cityMinLength: City must be at least 2 characters
validation.regionMinLength: State/Region must be at least 2 characters

hero.subtitle: Join synchronized study sessions with friends. Share notes, chat in real-time, and stay motivated with collaborative learning.
hero.trustedBy: Join the Future of Collaborative Learning
hero.footer: Free to start • No credit card required • Join 10,000+ students worldwide

features.title: Transform Your Learning Experience
features.subtitle: Discover powerful tools that revolutionize how you study, collaborate, and achieve your academic goals

synchronizedTimers.title: Synchronized Timers
synchronizedTimers.description: Pomodoro timers that sync across all room members for focused study sessions with breaks in perfect harmony

personalNotes.title: Personal Notes
personalNotes.description: Create and organize your personal notes within study rooms. Keep your thoughts private while staying connected to your study groups.

groupChat.title: Group Chat
groupChat.description: Instant messaging within study rooms to discuss topics, share resources, and stay connected

studyRooms.title: Study Rooms
studyRooms.description: Create or join public/private rooms with role-based permissions and member management

realTimeSync.title: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Everything updates instantly across all devices and participants with lightning-fast performance

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security, encryption, and privacy controls

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Study Sessions?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students already using StudyHub to achieve their learning goals together. Start your collaborative learning journey today.
